//Strings for privacy and policy
This privacy policy governs your use of products, services, content, features, technologies or functions offered by Bizzmark ("smartpoints" We") and all related sites, applications, and services (collectively "smartpoints loyalty Program") (including, without limitation, when you provide any information in relation to your use of smartpoints loyalty Program). You accept and consent to this privacy policy when you sign up for, access, or use the smartpoints loyalty Program thereby expressly agree to our use and disclosure of your personal information and direct us to do so in the manner described in this privacy
 Our privacy policy describes the information we collect and how we use that information. Smartpoints takes the processing of your information very seriously and will use your information only in accordance with the terms of this privacy policy. For the purposes of this privacy policy, the term "information" means any confidential and/or personally identifiable information or other.

Information related to users of smartpoints loyalty Program, including but not limited to smartpoints members and smartpoints partners. We will not sell or rent your information to third parties for their marketing purposes without your explicit consent. However, in order for us to offer smartpoints loyalty Program to our users; enhance the quality of smartpoints services from time to time; and protect the interests of our users, we will in limited circumstances share some of your information with third parties under strict restrictions. 
 This privacy policy is intended to govern the use of smartpoints services by our users (including, without limitation those who use the smartpoints services in the course of their trade or business) unless otherwise agreed through contract. While the word "privacy" may mean different things to different people, we believe that once you understand how we use your information; the steps we take to protect it, and the resulting benefits to you, you will not only feel confident when sharing information with us, but will also find your participation in the program a very rewarding experience.
Smartpoints collects both personal and non-personal information using the methods listed below. Our primary purpose in collecting such information is to provide you with a personalized smartpoints experience by displaying content and delivering offers that are likely to be of interest to you according to your preferences.
smartpoints collects both personal and non- personal information using the methods listed below. Our primary purpose in collecting such information is to provide you with a personalized smartpoints experience by displaying content and delivering offers that are likely to be of interest to you according to your preferences.
Our privacy policy describes the information We collect and how We use that information. smartpoints takes the processing of your information very seriously and will use your information only in accordance with the terms of this privacy policy. For the purposes of this privacy policy, the term "information" means any conﬁdential and/or personally identiﬁable information or other information related to users of smartpoints loyalty Program, including but not limited to smartpoints members and smartpoints partners. We will not sell or rent your information to third parties for their marketing purposes without your explicit consent. However, in order for us to offer smartpoints loyalty Program to our users; enhance the quality of smartpoints services from time to time; and protect the interests of our users, We will in limited circumstances share some of your information with third parties under strict restrictions, as described in more detail in sections 5 and 6 of this privacy policy. This privacy policy is intended to govern the use of smartpoints services by our users (including, without limitation those who use the smartpoints services in the course of their trade or business) unless otherwise agreed through contract. While the word "privacy" may mean different things to different people, we believe that once you understand how we use your information; the steps we take to protect it, and the resulting beneﬁt to you, you will not only feel conﬁdent when sharing information with us, but will also find your participation in the program a very rewarding experience.
To take advantage of the offers available at smartpoints loyalty Program, you must register for our service and become a smartpoints Member/Partner. smartpoints may collect personal information when you register with us and when you use smartpoints services. smartpoints may combine information about you that We have, with information We obtain from smartpoints merchants. During registration, We may require members to give us basic contact information (such as your first name, last name and email address) and demographic information (such as your zip code, age and gender).
Automatic Information collected through Participation in the smartpoints loyalty Program when you sign in to the smartpoints mobile application, the server automatically recognizes you by your cookie. This cookie acts as a unique identification, and is linked to your personal information, which allows us to personalize the application to your specified interests and allows you to access your personal information. It also allows us to keep track of your activity on our mobile application. This information may be added to your personal profile and used to deliver offers and advertisements that are most relevant to your interests.

Smartpoints also retrieves the following information from your application:

1. Date and time of your visit.
 2.Your registered smartpoints account information.
 3.Purchase transaction details (from merchants.
 4. Device details (like device name and software version details, imei number) This information, sometimes called log-in or click stream data, is used to monitor mobile applications performance and ensure they function properly. It may also be appended to your personal profile so that We may further tailor the Program to your interests.

1. Date and time of your visit.
 2.Your registered smartpoints account information.
 3.Purchase transaction detail (from smerchants.
 4. Device details (like device name and software version details, IMEI number) This information, sometimes called log-ﬁle or clickstream data, is used to monitor mobile applications performance and ensure they functions properly. It may also be appended to your personal profile so that We may further tailor the Program to your interests.

We do not rent, share, trade or sell your personal information to anyone for promotional purposes without your express consent. When we do share data with our advertisers it is in aggregate form and is designed to ensure you are not identified personally. We may allow other companies, such as our marketing partners and companies that are affiliated with smartpoints to otherwise communicate with you about our smartpoints loyalty Program. Such third party will be authorized to use this information in keeping with our contractual relationship with them and in accordance with their own privacy policy and information practices. We do not control these third parties and you agree that smartpoints is not liable for their acts or any failure to act on their part. smartpoints engages in email and direct sms marketing, where email/sms marketing is an integral part of the program, you sign up to receive email/sms targeted to your interests at the time of registration. If you later decide you wish to cease participation in this portion of the program. We may, without your consent, access and disclose your personal information, any communications sent or received by you, and any other information that we may have about you or your account in the following circumstances: as may be permitted or required by law, regulation, rule or court order; pursuant to requests from governmental, regulatory or administrative agencies or law enforcement authorities; or to prevent, investigate, identify persons or organizations potentially involved in, or take any action regarding suspected fraud, violations of our Terms of Service, or activity that appears to us to be illegal or may expose us to legal liability. Additionally, we may disclose your personal information in situations that we believe to be emergencies involving potential threats to the physical safety of any person or property if we believe that your personal information in any way Relates to that threat.
Smartpoints is committed to handling your customer information with high standards of information security. We use computer safeguards such as recalls and data encryption, we enforce physical access controls to our buildings and we authorize access to personal information only for those employees who require it to fulfil their job responsibilities. However, no data transmission over the Internet can be guaranteed to be completely secure. Accordingly, we cannot ensure or warrant the security of any information that you transmit to us, so you do so at your own risk.

Smartpoints is committed to adequately protecting your information regardless of where the data resides and to providing appropriate protection for your information where such data is transferred outside India servers.

smartpoints representatives will never ask you for your password, so any email or other communication requesting your password should be treated as unauthorized and suspicious and forwarded to smartpoints customer care.
At any time, you may unsubscribe from our alert email or text message or other newsletter or similar services through the mobile application . As a member, you will occasionally receive e-mail updates, from us about special offers, new services, and other noteworthy items. If you do not wish to receive them, please click on the "unsubscribe" link or follow the instructions in each email message. We reserve the right to limit membership to those who will accept such emails. smartpoints Member will be notified via email prior to any actions taken. Further, any person who ceases to be a smartpoints Member; their records may be removed within a period of seven days.
This privacy policy may be revised over time as new features are added to the smartpoints Services or as We incorporate suggestions from our affiliates, members and partners. We may change this privacy policy at any time by posting a revised version of it on our mobile application . Unless We have legal grounds to do otherwise, We will provide you a prior notice of the effective date of the revised privacy policy on our mobile application thereby both the smartpoints members and smartpoints partners on usage of the services of smartpoints hereby consent and agree to the form mentioned privacy policy.
//strings for terms and conditions The Terms and Conditions ("Terms") explain the nature and scope of the relationship between smartpoints {owned by Bizzmark } here in referred to as "smartpoints" or "We" (as owner and management for the program) and you, for downloading, accessing or using the mobile applications, websites or other products and services of Bizzmark . These terms affect your legal rights and In the event you use a service, feature, orfunctionality that is operated by a thirdparty and made available through ourServices (including Services we jointly offerwith the third party), each partys terms willgovern as to the respective partysrelationship with you.Please read these terms carefully, beforeusing our services.
"1. This mobile application "smartpoints" owned by the partnership firm Bizzmark incorporated under the partnership Act,1932 and having its office at 205 pavani kamal opposite sbh bank Abids Hyderabad 50001 and such expression shall unless repugnant to the context of meaning thereof, be deemed to mean and include its successors and permitted assigns."
 2. "smartpoints Member" shall mean an end customer, who is enrolled as a member of smartpoints holding a valid unique membership number with the smartpoints loyalty system programme."
 3. "smartpoints Member" shall mean an end customer, who is enrolled as a member of smartpoints holding a valid unique membership number with the smartpoints loyalty system programme."
 4. "smartpoints Merchants" shall mean any or all of the present or future entities, Merchants, shops, departmental stores, airlines, hotels, restaurants, car rental companies and other participating establishments in the program whether with online or offline presence, in agreement with smartpoints, where smartpointsMember can accumulate smartpoints for purchase of goods and services."
 5. "smartpoints" is also the unit currency of the program. smartpoints Member is awarded smartpoints for shopping at Stores registered with smartpoints programme."
 6. "smartpoints" means any offer, benifits, discount, on products of smartpoints Merchants."
 7. ""smartpoints Program" shall mean a multi-merchant Cashback program for end customers."
 8. "Redemption" means any activity, which results in exchange of smartpoints by a smartpoints Member for discounts or offers at smartpoints Merchants."

1. The smartpoints Member and smartpointsMerchants agree that by using thesmartpoints Program or byregistering for the services, he/sheis deemed to have read and understoodthese Terms and confirms thathe/she is bound by these Terms andany changes to it from time to time andsuch other terms as specified by smartpoints from time to time.
 2. smartpoints membership is valid for lifetime for the smartpoints Member unless terminated in accordance with these terms and conditions.
 3. smartpoints membership is non-transferable, except as specified in these Terms. smartpoints is non-negotiable, non-redeemable by cash and cannot be gifted, awarded or rewarded to any other person than a smartpoints Member.
 4. smartpoints Member will be personally liable for any and all costs, taxes, charges, claims or liabilities of whatever nature arising from the provision or availability of benefits , facilities or arrangements provided or made available to a smartpoints Member by smartpoints Merchants, as a result of his/her membership in the smartpoints loyalty Program.
 5. smartpoints reserves the right at any time in its absolute discretion and without giving notice to a smartpoints Member to deactivate the smartpoints membership.
 6. We will endeavour to ensure that the services, benefits, facilities and arrangements as expressed or advertised by the smartpoints Merchants and smartpoints will be available to the smartpoints Member. However, smartpoints will not be liable for any loss or damage, whether direct or indirect, arising from the provision or non-provision whether whole or part, of any such services, benefits ,facilities or any other arrangements bythe smartpoints Merchants.
 7. When a smartpoints Member seeks to use or obtain any of the services, benefits, facilities and arrangements as offered bythe smartpoints Merchant, the provisions of such services, benefits, facilities or arrangements will be subject to the respective terms and conditions of the smartpoints Merchant, being the provider of the said benefits, facilities and arrangements.
 8. Smartpoints shall not be liable for any loss or damage, whether direct or indirect, resulting from termination or change of the smartpoints loyalty Program or any of its facilities, benefits or arrangements which are made available to the smartpoints Member, including without any limitation, smartpoints Merchants withdrawal or the withdrawal or limiting of any such services, benefits or facilities.
 9. The smartpoints loyalty Program may be modified at the sole discretion of smartpoints from time to time without intimation to the smartpoints Member.
 10. smartpoints shall not be liable in the event it fails to fulfil any of its obligations under this terms and conditions due to flood, earthquake, storm, cyclone or any other acts of god of similar nature, war, strike, lockout, or governmental or judicial or change in law or for any other reasons beyond its control.
 11. A waiver of any of the Terms by smartpoints shall not be deemed to be a continuing waiver, but shall apply solely to the instances to which the waiver is directed.
 12. All smartpoints dispute or complaints older than one working day from the date of the transaction will not be entertained. The smartpoints Member must provide proof of transaction as discount or offer dispute.
 13. The smartpoints Member acknowledges and understands that we are merely an intermediary and does not assume any liability or acquire any right, title or interest in the smartpoints loyalty Program. We are only engaged in the management however all the smartpoints discounts or offers are offered by the smartpoints Merchants to the smartpoints Members directly and are responsible for the fulfilment of all obligations to the smartpoints Member.
 14. It is compulsory for a smartpoints member to be logged in or registered with smartpoints to avail the option to redeem their smartpoints.
 15. If a smartpoints member is not registered with smartpoints loyalty system and loses his Smartphone he used to earn smartpoints then there is no way he can get or ask for those lost points and smartpoints is not liable for any of this kind of losses.

1. It is the responsibility of smartpoints Member to share the correct communication details with smartpoints at the time of enrolling into the Program.
 2. Prospective smartpoints Members can enrol into the Program by downloading the smartpoints App from the Play store or receive the app from a smartpoints merchant and sign up by updating their profile.
 3. Each smartpoints Member shall have only one smartpoints Membership Account at any given point of time; if a smartpoints Member holds more than one account, the smartpoints Member should request smartpoints for account aggregation.
 4. If a smartpoints Member is found to have multiple memberships in the Program, smartpoints may choose to restrict any of the smartpoints membership.
 5. We reserve the right to offer the program to any prospective smartpoints Member; and have the sole discretion to either accept or reject membership to any application without assigning any reasons.

1. A smartpoints Member grants his/her consent to smartpoints for creating, storing, maintaining and updating the smartpoints members data. Such data shall include membership data (like name, address, telephone number, mobile number, date of birth, areas of interest, preferences,etc. as provided by the smartpoints Member)usage data (including without limitation, transactions and smartpoints accrued at various smartpoints Merchants,etc.), and data concerning contacts with smartpoints (including without limitation, enquiry regarding membership) for the purpose of providing relevant information and customer services to the smartpoints Member in connection with the Program. All data relating to the smartpoints Member shall be protected and used by smartpoints in the manner indicated in smartpoints privacy policy.
 2. If there are any changes in the contact details (mobile number/email id/address) of a smartpoints Member from what has been registered with smartpoints, the member must update the respective contact details with smartpoints immediately either through the mobile apps, contact centre or any other channels to avoid any misuse of smartpoints. Smartpoints shall not be liable for any loss of discounts or other relevant damages incurred by the member, if necessary details are not updated with smartpoints on time.

1. smartpoints Member can accrue smartpoints earned by them through a transaction with a smartpoints Merchant forth purchase of goods or services paid by cash, credit/debit card, cheque, online payment, standing instruction or any other means of payment agreed upon bythe smartpoints Merchant.
 2. Smartpoints awarded may vary between different smartpoints Merchants depending on the arrangement with the merchants from time to time.
 3. Smartpoints Member is required to obtain and preserve for a period of 30 working days appropriate documentation for all transactions done with smartpoints Merchants that earn smartpoints.
 4. Smartpoints has no liability for the acts and omissions of the smartpoints Merchants or any change brought in their terms and conditions brought in by respective smartpoints Merchants.
 5. Smartpoints accrued through transactions at smartpoints Merchants shall be credited to smartpoints Membership Account of the smartpoints Member within few minutes from the transaction time.
 6. Smartpoints will be accrued in whole and will not be awarded infractions.
 7. The respective smartpoints Merchants are responsible for the smartpoints issued under this Program and if any of them goes into liquidation or non-payment for this discounts or offer or any similar event, We shall not be liable to honour smartpoints which has been credited to the smartpoints Membership Account and are yet to be redeemed, where they have not been fully funded bythe smartpoints Merchants as on that date.
1. smartpointsMembers/smartpoints Merchants can call customer care numbers or login to their account in the mobile application for obtaining a summary of their recent transactions and obtain their smartpoints Account balance.
 2. Any notice, information, intimation, change, modification, alteration of the smartpoints loyalty Program shall be deemed to have been given to the smartpointsMember/smartpoints Merchants forthwith upon any change on the respective mobile applications.

1. Smartpoints of a particular store can only be redeemed at that same particular smartpoints Merchant store.
 2. For the purpose of Redemption, the smartpointsMember will directly enter into a sale and purchase relationship with the concerned smartpoints Merchants of the smartpoints loyalty Program. We only facilitate Redemption of the smartpoints.
 3. Any product of smartpoints Merchants can be redeemed with the smartpoints; in case any product or service selected by a smartpoints Member is not available, smartpoints Member may proceed to choose/select from the other available products and services.
 4. smartpoints has no monetary refund value and shall only be redeemed for goods and services with smartpointsMerchants.
 5. Discounts or offers which are redeemed by using smartpoints are not exchangeable for other Cashback or eligible for refunds.

1. A smartpoints Member may terminate his/her membership through call/email and requesting for termination. The smartpoints Member shall provide the required customer credentials that he or she had provided at the time of signing up for the programme.
 2. Misuse of smartpoints membership benefits may result in termination of the smartpoints Membership Account and smartpoints Merchants or withdrawal of benefits at the sole discretion of smartpoints.

1. smartpoints reserves the right to terminate the Program, by giving 30 working days’ notice to all smartpointsMembers.
 2. Upon termination or withdrawal of the Program, all smartpointsMember will be given 30 working days’ time within which they may use the smartpoints for Redemption for discounts or offers, beyond the date the smartpoints in Members smartpoints Account will be purged.
 3. All claims and disputes arising under the terms and conditions should be notified to smartpoints within one working day from the event date after which no smartpoints Member shall have any claim against smartpoints. All disputes will be subjected to Indian jurisdiction.
 4. Once a transaction of smartpoints is executed it cannot be retreated.
 5. Upon any mistake or negligence from the smartpoints merchant shall be looked upon by smartpoints management and resolved as soon as possible.
 6.Any mistake by a smartpoints member during the transaction of smartpoints cannot be retreated until the member informs the smartpoints management about the issue within 1 day of the transaction.

1. This communication does not imply that smartpoints will actually pay the member utility bills.
 2. By this communication, we are only stating that the discounts or offers earned by the member by shopping at smartpoints merchants will be more or less equal to his/utility bills.
 3. smartpoints is not a wallet and does not accept payment of any utility bill.
 4. The members are explicitly informed that this is only a creative rendition of the theme, and does not in any way involve smartpoints as the payment platform for utility bills.
 5. It is mandatory for participating members to read and understand these terms and conditions fully, before commencing their shopping at smartpoints merchants.
 6. smartpoints is in no way responsible for any miscommunication that may be interpreted by the members.
 7. For more clarification, the member should contact smartpoints and fully understand this communication before commencing his/ her shopping.
 8. Smartpoints will not be responsible for the consequences of smartpoints Merchant on accepting wrong and incorrect bill amount by the smartpoints member. As the smartpoints Merchant has two verification steps that he accepts before granting any smartpoints to the smartpoints member.
 9. In any matter whatsoever, the decision of smartpoints management will be final and binding.
 10. smartpoints reserves the right to change these terms and conditions in any way whatsoever, without informing smartpoints members and merchants.
 11. By acting on this communication, you are accepting and agreeing upon all the above terms and conditions.

//strings for FAQ
1. what is smart points ? Smartpoints is a reward program that enables you to "earn points every time you make a purchase" at a Smartpoints Store, you are instantly rewarded with Smartpoints which is credited into your Smartpoints Account
2. How does the reward system work ? Its simple. When you spend at any Smartpoints Store you earn a reward as a token of thank you from our partner Store for doing business with them. For e.g.: If they are running an assured reward of 5% Smartpoints reward and you make a purchase of INR 1000, you would be entitled to EARN 50 Smartpoints.
3. Are there any joining fee ? No its free and always will be
4. How can I use Smartpoints ? You can use Smartpoints reward program by just downloading it from the google playstore or taking the app from our partner store and installing it on to your device and you are ready to earn smartpoints.
5. What is my Eligibility criteria ? You should be having a smartphone with android version 4.0 or above.
6. Is it compulsory to have the SmartpointS app ? Yes its compulsory. And there are great advantages if you have the app! track the Smartpoints you recieved from our Smartpoints Stores at your fingertips Manage your Smartpoints account,smartpoints earned and redeemed across Stores . Stay updated about latest offers from all the retailers. As new retailers keep joining the program, their offers will be instantly available to you
7. Will I get a card that I need to carry every time I spend at a SmartpointS Store ? No, its a card-less program. Your smartphone is your unique identity Every time you wish to do a transaction at a Smartpoints Store, all you have to do is scan the qr code and follow the steps.
8. How do I track my Smartpoints ? You can check your Smartpoints in our mobile app.
9. How does the merchant know whether I am a Smartpoints member or not? How do I identify myself ? There is no physical or digital card as your identity. It is your smartphone which is your unique identity. If you are not a Smartpoints member yet, when you are in any of the Smartpoints Store, you can download our app from google playstore or ask the owner of the store to give you the app.
10. What is the process to Earn, Track and Redeem my SmartpointS ? Once you install the smartpoints app you can find out our merchant partners. Spot the Smartpoints logo, at the transacting Store to earn Smartpoints. You can track your accumulated Smartpoints on our Smartpoints app or by calling us on our helpline number. Whenever you shop at any Smartpoints Store, you can redeem your Smartpoints against your bill.
11. What is the value of my Smartpoints ? For every smartpoints store the value of the smartpoints change according to the merchants offers and loyalty program.
12. I did not receive any Smartpoints after transacting. What should I do ? A. After you transact, please make sure that you ask for your Smartpoints. Please scan the QR code and follow the steps and if you still dont receive the smartpoints please contact us.
13. Will i lose my smartpoints if i dont register with smartpoints ? A. Yes its compulsory to register with smartpoints to make sure that you dont lose your smartpoints, as smartpoints are linked with your device or Smartphone till you dont register and hence if you lose your Smartphone without registering with smartpoints you will lose all your smartpoints.
14. Is it compulsory to register with smartpoints to redeem smartpoints ? A. Yes, its compulsory to register with smartpoints if you want to redeem any smartpoints. But you can enjoy earning smartpoints without registering with us.
